snippet: NEWMAN--Betty R.,89, died peacefully in North Caldwell on May 16, 2016. Born in New York City, she resided for 36 years in West Orange before moving to Short Hills in 1992. She is survived by her sons, John (Ann) and Scott (Wendy), and her grandchildren, Daniel (Rebecca), Rachel (Corey), Cody and Becky. Her husband of 50 years, Richard, died in 1999. Funeral services will be held 1:00pm Tuesday at Bernheim-Apter- Kreitzman Suburban Funeral Chapel, 68 Short Hills Road, Livingston, NJ. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Newark Academy for the Betty Newman Scholarship Fund. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NEWMAN, BETTY R.
